description: Identifies comparable instruments on the market, giving buyers context for performance, features and price–performance trade-offs.
prompt: Create a list (array) of analog instruments for this model, including key technical specifications, control interfaces, typical applications, and estimated prices.

description: Shows the current market price span—both new-unit and used-unit—helping customers budget and benchmark quotations.
prompt: Provide the current price range for the instrument, both new and used, including sources if available.

description: Lists the most frequently reported malfunctions, typical symptoms and likely root causes, supporting risk assessment and maintenance planning.
prompt: List the most common malfunctions for the instrument, along with their symptoms and possible causes.
